st:Description.name: EleciXFIntegration
st:Description.st:role: Interface for interaction with external data
st:Description.st:detailedRole: It gives an interface to interact with external data i.e. iXF data repository path, working catalog path

st:attribute.Name: EnableExtAppIntegration
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Allows you to work with external systems

st:enum.st:role: Use folder option to specify the xml path

st:attribute.Name: iXFRepository
st:attribute.st:role: Defines the location of the xml files
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the location of the xml files

st:attribute.Name: WorkingCatalog
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the electrical working catalog that will be used for the placement of devices

st:attribute.Name: IdentifierAttribute
st:attribute.st:role: Sets the identifier to the 'instance name' attribute
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Onle set the identifier to the 'instance name' attribute, when using ENOVIA V5 VPM

st:enum.st:role: Do not set the identifier to the 'instance name' attribute
Set the identifier to the 'instance name' attribute
